column4: I have a problem with Netgear USB Wireless WNA110 - i am running a fresh installation of Ubuntu 10.10
I have a problem with Netgear USB Wireless WNA110 -  the device is not recognized by the system - i am running a fresh installation of Ubuntu 10.10
Wireless documentation, including how-to guides and troubleshooting information, can be found at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs
